Author: SheDontCarrie
Text: So tough what you are going through. Sending good thoughts your way. I had a similar experience and started with gentle workouts and healthy eating. Yoga with Adrienne is on YouTube for free and she has gentle yoga that can help with feeling healthier, back pain, self-esteem and rebuilding strength. You have it in you to live a healthy lifestyle, you were doing it and can get back to it.
